title: Philippine Society of Information Technology Educators
text: The Philippine Society of Information Technology Educators (PSITE) is a <a href="professional%20body">professional body</a> of <a href="information%20technology">information technology</a> education practitioners in the <a href="Philippines">Philippines</a>. Its members are primarily <a href="academic">academic</a>s; <a href="teacher">teacher</a>s of <a href="computer%20science">computer science</a>, <a href="information%20technology">information technology</a>, <a href="Information%20and%20Communication%20Technology%20%28education%29">information and communication technology</a>, <a href="engineering">engineering</a>, <a href="mathematics">mathematics</a> and other allied fields. Industrial practitioners, however, such as <a href="programmer">programmer</a>s, <a href="systems%20analyst">systems analyst</a>s, <a href="web%20developer">web developer</a>s and others are welcomed as well.
